2239.text: and many many preparations of past books to reprint.

2244.text: And out of her weakness, she was made strong.

2248.text: And in that weakness, she prayed this, listen to what she prayed:

2255.text: We will not linger on the lower slope.

2258.text: Fill us afresh with hope, O God of hope.

2261.text: That, undefeated, we may climb the hill, seeing Him who is invisible;

2267.text: and let us die climbing, not fainting."

2273.text: Are you going to die climbing, sister, and not fainting?

2276.text: Are you going to endure to the end, brother, persevering on,

2281.text: pressing on, being strengthened with the strength that He supplies,

2285.text: waiting on the Lord and not fainting?

2288.text: Beloved, do not faint. Christ is with you.

2294.text: The Holy Spirit is in you if you're His child.

2297.text: You have the exceeding great and precious promises of God.

2300.text: There is no excuse for fainting. Learn not to faint.

2303.text: Learn to wait upon the Lord, and He will keep His promise, as sure as He is true,

2310.text: to strengthen the weary and the needy one.

2334.text: Father would you take Your Word and just apply it and make it real to us.

2351.text: And let it transform many who this is their very need.

2367.text: Lord, You have strength and renewal for them.

2372.text: So give us grace to wait upon You and believe Your promises.

2376.text: To lay hold, Lord; to believe God.

2387.text: We thank you for the blessed reality of Isaiah chapter 40

2395.text: and what You say in those last verses.

2397.text: Lord, make it real to us.

2401.text: And Lord, may many this night, even after long journey to get here, and there's weariness.

2408.text: Lord, do this for many, we pray.

2412.text: Do this miracle of renewal and strength and encouragement rising.

2417.text: Lord, lift some who have been faltering up on wings as eagles.

2424.text: We thank You in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
